entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: The Game of Life 2
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life CollectionÔºö$34.99 ‚Üí $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $34.99]

Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Game‚Äù in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: The Greedy Cave
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy CaveÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]

Application Description

In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ... -------------------------------------------------------- In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters. Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave... Game Features ¬∑Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time! ¬∑Hundreds of monsters to defeat! ¬∑Hundreds of equipment to collect! ¬∑Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer! ¬∑Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore! Contact us cs.thegreedycave@avalongames.com https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. About section and link to support page

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Goodnotes 6: AI Notes & Docs
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Marketplace ContentÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $10.99]

Application Description

Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documents‚Äîperfect for your next important meeting. ‚Ä¢ Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes. ‚Ä¢ Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail. ‚Ä¢ Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices. ‚Ä¢ New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notes‚Äîall without switching tools. ‚Ä¢ Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes. ‚Ä¢ Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV. Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools ‚Ä¢ Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information. ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting. ‚Ä¢ Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly. ‚Ä¢ Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition. ‚Ä¢ No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones. ‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions ‚Ä¢ Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster. Enhance Creative Digital Planning ‚Ä¢ Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style. ‚Ä¢ Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook. ‚Ä¢ Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity. ‚Ä¢ Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners. ‚Ä¢ Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search. ‚Ä¢ Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription. ‚Ä¢ Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours. Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today. Website: www.goodnotes.com X: @goodnotesapp Instagram: @goodnotes.app Pinterest: @goodnotesapp TikTok: @goodnotesapp Privacy policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions

entry.title: Skul: The Hero Slayer
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Skul is a fast-paced action rogue-lite where losing your head is encouraged. Featuring 100 playable characters each with their own unique abilities and a ton of items that can create wild synergies, the battles are as electrifying as they are challenging. The Demon King's Castle in Ruins The human race attacking the Demon King's castle is nothing new and has happened countless times before. What makes this time different though, is that the Adventurers decided to join forces with the Imperial Army and the 'Hero of Caerleon' to lead a full onslaught in hopes of wiping out the Demons once and for all. They attacked the Demon stronghold with overwhelming numbers and succeeded in its total destruction. All of the demons in the castle were taken prisoner except for one lone skeleton named 'Skul'. Dark Mirror Mode Once you're through with the main story, test your skills and limits in the new challenging 'Dark Mirror' mode! FEATURES -You‚Äôre the last hope of the entire demon race! Play as Skul, a tiny skeleton on a path to slay the pompous heroes and save the demon king from the corrupt army of Carleon. -Losing your head never felt so right: try on new skulls to borrow the powers and dashing outfits of their previous owners and create synergies with unique items to defeat your enemies. -What is dead may never die: you will not rest until you have faced all the challenges of this action-packed rogue-lite platformer. -Let your hollow eyes feast upon vibrant, cartoony pixel-art 2D animations as you help all sorts of demonic creatures return to their original state. -From the Mummies of Egypt to the Minotaur of Greece or even an official Dead Cells crossover‚Ä¶ Will you spot all the fun easter eggs scattered across the game? CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface ‚Äì exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control - Game Center achievements - Cloud Save ‚Äì Share your progress between iOS devices - Compatible with MFi controllers - iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

entry.title: Dead Cells
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$8.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $8.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Death is not the end. Play as a failed alchemic experiment and explore the sprawling, ever-changing castle to find out what happened on this gloomy island‚Ä¶! That is, assuming you‚Äôre able to fight your way past its keepers. Dead Cells is a roguevania action platformer that will require you to master frantic 2D combat with a wide variety of weapons and skills against merciless minions and boss. Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat. First available on PC and consoles, the indie hit Dead Cells is now slaying foes on mobile! Main Features ‚Ä¢ Roguevania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath ‚Ä¢ Frantic and Dynamic 2D Action: Learn your enemies‚Äô patterns to stay alive, or prepare to be sent back to your cell before you can say ‚Äúbaguette‚Äù ‚Ä¢ Nonlinear Progression: Unlock new levels with every death, opt for the path that suits your current build, your playstyle or just your mood. Surely, the ramparts can‚Äôt be as bad as the sewers, right? ‚Ä¢ Play at your own pace: Will you explore every nook and cranny of the castle, or rush to the end? *Latest updates are available: Clean Cut & The End is Near* RETURN TO CASTLEVANIA DLC Time for some vampire slaying ‚Ä¢ New storyline - overcome the Ruler of Darkness alongside Alucard and Richter Belmont, ‚Ä¢ 2 new biomes - Explore Dracula's Castle and its outskirts ‚Ä¢ 9 new monsters - Werewolves, haunted armors, and medusas are waiting for you ‚Ä¢ 14 new weapons - wield the Vampire Killer or the Holy Water to defeat creatures of the night, ‚Ä¢ 3 new bosses - go fangs to fangs against Death and Dracula himself ‚Ä¢ 20 new outfits - dress as your favorite Castlevania characters such as Simon and Richter Belmont or Alucard ‚Ä¢ Alternative soundtracks - play along 51 Castlevania original tracks and 12 tunes reimagined in the style of Dead Cells THE BAD SEED DLC You reap what you sow ‚Ä¢ New levels to lose your head in the not-so-peaceful Dilapidated Arboretum and the noxious Morass of the Banished ‚Ä¢ New monsters to rip to pieces: get to know the locals, such as the Jerkshroom and the Yeeter ‚Ä¢ New weapons to play with: trim sticking-out heads with the Scythe Claw, or make them dance to the sound of the Rhythm n' Bouzouki ‚Ä¢ New boss to fight against: Mama Tick is dying to meet you FATAL FALLS DLC Ready for a leap of faith? ‚Ä¢ 3 new biomes - Get some fresh air at the Fractured Shrines, splash around at the Undying Shores and take a picture at the Mausoleum ‚Ä¢ 8 new monsters - The Cold Blooded Guardians and their friends would love to teach you about their culture. ... Wait, aren't those relatives of yours in the Undying Shores...? ‚Ä¢ 7 new weapons - Lil' Serenade is perfect for breaking the ice with the locals, although the Snake Fangs would make for a perfect souvenir... ‚Ä¢ 1 new boss - The Scarecrow is very proud of his gardening skills and won't hesitate to show off QUEEN AND THE SEA DLC Take it to the sea! ‚Ä¢ 2 new biomes - Battle your way through a rotten shipwreck, or scale a burning lighthouse and confront your deadliest foe yet. ‚Ä¢ 9 new weapons, including a throwable shark, a trident and a pirate hook hand (eyepatch not included). ‚Ä¢ 2 new bosses - Don't lose your head before you meet the Queen! This DLC also gives you the usual extras: - A not-so-cute pet. - Loads of new outfits. - New enemies to bash. WARNING: Devices with less than 2 Gb of RAM may not be able to run this content correctly. We recommend not to take this DLC if your device is under 2gb of RAM. Carefully redesigned for mobile with a revamped interface ‚Ä¢ Two game modes available: Original & Auto-Hit ‚Ä¢ Custom controls & More touch controls options available: Change the buttons‚Äô position and size to your liking, swipe to dodge‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ MFi external controller support ‚Ä¢ No ads, no F2P mechanics! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue.

Escape your childhood fears. First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile! ‚Ä®Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears! Help Six escape The Maw ‚Äì a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal. As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover. Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out! Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design. Sneak your way out of the Maw‚Äôs dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. FEATURES - Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure - Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants - Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles - Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface - Game Center achievements - Compatible with MFi controllers If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. entry.title: QUAKELINE
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love? In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city ‚Äî from Bakƒ±rk√∂y to √úsk√ºdar ‚Äî to find the woman you love. Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul ‚Äî from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor. On your journey to save your girlfriend, you‚Äôll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins‚Äîand their stories‚Äîwill push you to make difficult moral choices. To move forward, you‚Äôll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely. Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit. Witness the struggle to survive‚Äîand the power of hope. In this unforgettable journey, you‚Äôll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

Application Description

LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters. 20+ HANDMADE FILTERS The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD. FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds. DUST EFFECT Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects. LIGHT LEAKS You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS. BOKEH EFFECT If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects. NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image. You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films. Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. entry.title: 8mm Vintage Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö$39.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $39.99]

Application Description

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS ‚Ä¢ Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies ‚Ä¢ Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style ‚Ä¢ 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm ‚Ä¢ 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes ‚Ä¢ Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription ‚Ä¢ Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes ‚Ä¢ Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. ‚Ä¢ Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you‚Äôll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

entry.title: PlayNav - No ads in videos!
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features you‚Äôll love: ‚Ä¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. ‚Ä¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. ‚Ä¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) ‚Ä¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. ‚Ä¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. ¬ª HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. ¬ª How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. ‚Äì TRY PLAYNAV NOW! ‚Äì Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 15 or higher. ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher. ¬ª Related keywords: YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads. - Need help? Visit: playnav.vidiom.app or contact us at info@playnav.vidiom.app Terms of Service: playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

entry.title: 13:20:Sync
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

This app puts the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar in your pocket! "13:20:Sync makes it so much easier to understand and integrate the calendar into every day life. Highly recommend it." The Mayan People have described, in breathtaking precision, the cycles of both the universe and nature around us. They created a harmonic calendar that is synchronized to all those cycles. Following these cycles can help you get a stronger connection with nature around you and become conscious of your essence. This app provides a simple way to sync along those cycles, to raise our frequency and give us a new lens to view both our day-to-day and planetary events. - Did you ever realize that our (Gregorian) calendar is not a harmonic calendar? - Did you know that the moon has 13 (not 12!) orbits around the earth in 1 year? - Why do we live with this irregular calendar? - Are you interested in Astrology? -> All this, and more, is explained carefully in this app. (over 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only. In the New Time, synchronicity is the norm. ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 5 star rating across the world! ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// "Entertaining as well as enlightening" ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// MORE INFO: www.1320sync.com For the beginner this app is a learning tool because it contains an extensive explanation about Tones and Seals and the synchronizing order of the Mayan Astrology. You may think it's difficult at first but soon you will feel how it all connects. "This app is great, and allows easy manipulation of dates. I spent years in books doing in hours what I can now do in seconds." For the ones who are already familiar with the Mayan Calendar this app is a handy tool to navigate the cycles, and calculate the Combined Kin for any given combination. Furthermore this app can be of great assistance to teach other people about the 13:20 cycles and is used in teachings around the world. === FEATURES === + Kin Calendar This is your main Mayan Dreamspell Calendar Dashboard with all the details you need to stay in sync. Shows the Kin of today by default, and you can calculate the Kin for any other date. + Personal Notes On this new page you can keep your personal notes for the 2 main cycles of time: the Tzolkin cycle of 260 days and the 13 Moon cycle of 365 days. And with the powerful text search function you quickly find your notes. + Kin Picker Select any combination of the 13 Tones and 20 Seals. Top section can scroll to 4 pages with information. + Combined Kin Calculator Calculate the Combined Kin of any combination of Kin. You can add as many Kin as you like to calculate the Combined Kin for a group of people. + Tzolkin with indication of the GAP day's and Wavespell and more. Tap and hold to select a Kin number directly. + Contact Import All contacts in your Contacts App will be automatically imported and assigned to the correct Kin. See all your contacts with their Mayan Reading and how you relate to them. + 13 Moon Calendar Full integration of 13 Moon Calendar. (doubles as a birthday calendar!) + 13:20 Information Lots of information about the theory behind synchronization to help you navigate the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar. The texts provide a clear explanation of the Cycles of Time. (More than 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only. + Sharing On all the 3 main tabs you can share the current selected Galactic Signature using your favorite app. # Based on the work of Jos√© Arg√ºelles. # This app was made with permission of and in cooperation with the Foundation for the Law of Time - www.lawoftime.org, # Ariel Spilsbury.
